verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of David. Michtam; when Saul sent, and they watched the house to kill him. Deliver <WH5337> me from mine enemies <WH341>, O my God <WH430>: Set me on high <WH7682> from them that rise up against me <WH6965>.
Deliver <WH5337> me from the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205>, And save <WH3467> me from the bloodthirsty <WH1818> men <WH582>.

For <WH693>, lo, they lie in wait for my soul <WH5315>; The mighty <WH5794> gather <WH1481> themselves together against me <WH6588>: Not for my transgression, nor for my sin <WH2403>, O Jehovah <WH3068>.
They run <WH7323> and prepare <WH3559> themselves without my fault <WH5771>: Awake <WH5782> thou to help <WH7125> me <WH7200>, and behold.

Even thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, Arise <WH6974> to visit <WH6485> all the nations <WH1471>: Be not merciful <WH2603> to any wicked <WH205> transgressors <WH898>. <WH5542>[[Selah
They return <WH7725> at evening <WH6153>, they howl <WH1993> like a dog <WH3611>, And go round about <WH5437> the city <WH5892>.
Behold <WH5042>, they belch out with their mouth <WH6310>; Swords <WH2719> are in their lips <WH8193>: For who <WH8085>, say they, doth hear?
But thou <WH3068>, O Jehovah, wilt laugh <WH7832> at them <WH1471>; Thou wilt have all the nations in derision <WH3932>.
Because of his strength <WH5797> I will give heed <WH8104> unto thee <WH430>; For God is my high tower <WH4869>.
My God <WH430> with his lovingkindness <WH2617> will meet <WH6923> me <WH430>: God will let me see <WH7200> my desire upon mine enemies <WH8324>.
Slay <WH2026> them not <WH5971>, lest my people forget <WH7911>: Scatter <WH5128> them by thy power <WH2428>, and bring them down <WH3381>, O Lord <WH136> our shield <WH4043>.

For the sin <WH2403> of their mouth <WH6310>, and the words <WH1697> of their lips <WH8193>, Let them even be taken <WH3920> in their pride <WH1347>, And for cursing <WH423> and lying <WH3585> which they speak <WH5608>.

Consume <WH3615> them in wrath <WH2534>, consume <WH3615> them <WH3045>, so that they shall be no more: And let them know that God <WH430> ruleth <WH4910> in Jacob <WH3290>, Unto the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>. <WH5542>[[Selah
And at evening <WH6153> let them return <WH7725>, let them howl <WH1993> like a dog <WH3611>, And go round about <WH5437> the city <WH5892>.
They shall wander up and down <WH5128> for food <WH398>, And tarry <WH3885> all night if they be not satisfied <WH7646>.

But I will sing <WH7891> of thy strength <WH5797>; Yea <WH7442>, I will sing aloud of thy lovingkindness <WH2617> in the morning <WH1242>: For thou hast been my high tower <WH4869>, And a refuge <WH4498> in the day <WH3117> of my distress <WH6862>.
Unto thee <WH5797>, O my strength, will I sing <WH2167> praises <WH430>: For God is my high tower <WH4869>, the God <WH430> of my mercy <WH2617>.
